outline:
1. to be or become drunk or drunken, be intoxicated
    1. (Qal) to become drunken
    2. (Piel) to make drunken, cause to be drunk
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to be drunk
    4. (Hithpael) to make oneself drunk
kjv_def: (be filled with) drink (abundantly), (be, make) drunk(-en), be merry. (Superlative of H8248 (שָׁקָה).)
strongs_def: to become tipsy; in a qualified sense, to satiate with astimulating drink or (figuratively) influence
